data.client_settings: Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 9672, Version Hash: e8ecbdade16e008a41dca2c84f0e3d4aa4224223
data.actual_result: The discord client crashes and says "Well, this is awkward. Looks like Discord has crashed unexpectedly..."
data.expected_result: The client should just not save the role that it was attempting to save
data.short_description: When I try to create a role while waiting for changes to save, the client crashes.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open up server settings - Click "Roles" - Create a new role - Name it - Press Enter - Click "Save Changes" - While the changes are being saved, click the plus icon that creates a new role
